greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Eigentriangle generated from A109128, row sums = expansion of {2(exp(x)-1)}
comment: Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Example: row 3 = (1, 5, 10, 6) = termwise products of (1, 5, 5, 1) and (1, 1, 2, 6), where (1, 5, 5, 1) = row 3 of triangle A109128 and (1, 1, 2, 6) = the first 4 terms of A001861 shifted.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_ & _Roger L. Bagula_, Sep 09 2008
